cleaned_text: What is Integrative Medicine? The field of integrative health and medicine reaffirms the importance of the relationship between practitioner and patient, focuses on the whole person, is informed by evidence, and makes use of all appropriate therapeutic approaches, healthcare professionals and professions to achieve optimal health and healing. Simply put, integrative health and medicine offer best practices for optimal health and healing. (source: [aihm.org](https://www.aihm.org/about/what-is-integrative-medicine/)) New Treatments Available! Northampton Integrative Medicine is pleased to announce the addition of [subcutaneous peptide injections](https://northamptonintegrativemedicine.com/services-we-offer/peptide-therapy/), [NAD IV therapy](https://northamptonintegrativemedicine.com/services-we-offer/nad-nicotinamide-adenine-dinucleotide-iv-therapy/), and [skin and hair restoration and rejuvination](https://northamptonintegrativemedicine.com/services-we-offer/skin-rejuvination-and-restoration/) services to our treatment protocols! If you think you may benefit from a significant boost to your immune system, to help with chronic infections or autoimmune disorders, or want to improve your general well-being, you may want to discuss one of these treatments with your practitioner at your next office visit.
